name: clonidine hydrochloride

indications.text: clonidine hydrochloride tablets indicated treatment hypertension . clonidine hydrochloride tablets may employed alone concomitantly antihypertensive agents .

warningsAndPrecautions: clonidine hydrochloride tablets , usp supplied : 0.1 mg white round shaped , biconvex , scored tablets , debossed `` u `` `` 135 `` either side breakline one side plain side . ndc : 70518-3162-00 ndc : 70518-3162-01 ndc : 70518-3162-02 ndc : 70518-3162-03 ndc : 70518-3162-04 packaging : 30 1 blister pack packaging : 30 1 blister pack packaging : 30 1 blister pack packaging : 100 1 bottle plastic packaging : 180 1 bottle plastic store 20oto 25oc ( 68o 77of ) [ usp controlled room temperature ] . dispense tight , light-resistant container . repackaged distributed : remedy repack , inc. 625 kolter dr. suite # 4 indiana , pa 1-724-465-8762

indications_original: Clonidine hydrochloride tablets are indicated in the treatment of hypertension. Clonidine hydrochloride tablets may be employed alone or concomitantly with other antihypertensive agents.
warningsAndPrecautions_original:
Clonidine Hydrochloride Tablets, USP are supplied as:
                  0.1 mg
                  White round shaped, biconvex, scored tablets, debossed with "U" and "135" on either side of breakline on one side and plain on other side.
                  NDC: 70518-3162-00
                  NDC: 70518-3162-01
                  NDC: 70518-3162-02
                  NDC: 70518-3162-03
                  NDC: 70518-3162-04
                  PACKAGING: 30 in 1 BLISTER PACK
                  PACKAGING: 30 in 1 BLISTER PACK
                  PACKAGING: 30 in 1 BLISTER PACK
                  PACKAGING: 100 in 1 BOTTLE PLASTIC
                  PACKAGING: 180 in 1 BOTTLE PLASTIC
                  
                  
                  
                  Store at 20oto 25oC (68o to 77oF) [see USP Controlled Room Temperature].
                  Dispense in a tight, light-resistant container.
                  
                  
                  Repackaged and Distributed By:
                  Remedy Repack, Inc.
                  625 Kolter Dr. Suite #4 Indiana, PA 1-724-465-8762
